undepBasis_corp_hc.description: Haircut on corporate depreciation deductions taken beginning in YEAR on investments made before YEAR.

undepBasis_noncorp_hc.description: Haircut on noncorporate depreciation deductions taken beginning in YEAR on investments made before YEAR.

amt_repeal.description: Repeals the corporate alternative minimum tax. Equivalent to setting tau_amt to zero.

pymtc_repeal.description: Repeals the prior year minimum tax credit.

ftc_hc.description: Haircut on the foreign tax credit.

sec199_hc.description: Haircut on the domestic production deduction.

oldIntPaid_corp_hc.description: Haircut on interest deduction on previously issued corporate debt.

newIntPaid_corp_hc.description: Haircut on interest deduction on newly issued corporate debt.

oldIntPaid_noncorp_hc.description: Haircut on interest deduction on previously issued noncorporate debt.

newIntPaid_noncorp_hc.description: Haircut on interest deduction on newly issued noncorporate debt.

reclassify_taxdep_gdslife.description: Reclassification of depreciation tax life for existing group of assets with that GDS class life.
reclassify_taxdep_gdslife.notes: May only implement once. Requires dictionary pairing existing tax life with new tax life.

reclassify_taxdep_adslife.description: Reclassification of depreciation tax life for existing group of assets with that ADS class life.
reclassify_taxdep_adslife.notes: May only implement once. Requires dictionary pairing existing tax life with new tax life.
